audio_transcription_team.description: A team to transcribe audio to text.

full_conversation_team.description: A full team for an audio conversation: transcribe, translate, respond, and synthesize the response.

translation_and_response_team.description: A team to transcribe, translate, and formulate a text response.

direct_conversation_team.description: A team for a direct conversation: transcribe and respond in the same language.

grammar_check_conversation_team.description: A team for a conversation with grammar checking: transcribe, correct grammar, and then respond.

full_grammar_conversation_team.description: A full conversation with grammar check and voice response.

feedback_team.description: A team focused only on providing grammar feedback.

detailed_feedback_team.description: A team that provides detailed, structured feedback by separating correction from feedback generation.

feedback_and_conversation_team.description: A team that provides structured feedback and then continues the conversation.
